Sentencas: AgScMo2O8 was synthesized by wet-chemistry method.
Titulo: Synthesis, characterization, high temperature phase transition and electrical properties of solid solution AgScMo2O8

Sentencas: The samples were characterized by differential thermal analysis/thermogravimetry, differential scanning calorimetry (DTA/TG, DSC), X-ray diffraction (XRD) and X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS).
Titulo: Synthesis, characterization, high temperature phase transition and electrical properties of solid solution AgScMo2O8

Sentencas: The novel structure of the sample is different to the other oxide AgLnMo(2)O(8)
Titulo: Synthesis, characterization, high temperature phase transition and electrical properties of solid solution AgScMo2O8
Synthesis, characterization, high temperature phase transition and electrical properties of solid solution AgScMo2O8

Sentencas: The XRD and DTA/TG, DSC results showed that the formation temperature of AgScMo2O8 was found to be as low as 450 degrees C, and AgScMo2O8 crystallized in a monoclinic-type structure at room temperature.
Titulo: Synthesis, characterization, high temperature phase transition and electrical properties of solid solution AgScMo2O8

Sentencas: With increasing of the temperature two phase transition processes (monoclinic to hextetrahedral and tetragonal) appeared.
Titulo: Synthesis, characterization, high temperature phase transition and electrical properties of solid solution AgScMo2O8

Sentencas: The electrical property of the samples was also investigated by using A.C impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Synthesis, characterization, high temperature phase transition and electrical properties of solid solution AgScMo2O8

Sentencas: It showed that an abrupt increase of electrical conductivity was found around 500 degrees C, which attributes to phase transition.
Titulo: Synthesis, characterization, high temperature phase transition and electrical properties of solid solution AgScMo2O8

Sentencas: The facts indicted that this kind of material shows a potential application in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Synthesis, characterization, high temperature phase transition and electrical properties of solid solution AgScMo2O8
